name: Gametime
0:
”Alexa, open game time”
”Alexa, start game time”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: game time
des:
Open the skill and ask Alexa for one of the pre-defined countdown timers. Alexa will read the into message and the countdown (5,4,3,2,1), and then play a fun sound effect.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
